dialogue.text: How's the training going? Hmmm... Level 70... That's still not much, but you have really made some strides since the first time I met you fresh out of ice. Keep training, and I am sure one day you'll be able to regain your pre-battle form.

But before doing that, I'll need you back in Rein for a bit. #bYour pole arm is reacting strange once again. It looks like it has something it wants to tell you. #kIt might be able to awaken your hidden powers, so please come immediately.
#b(You need to think about this for a second...)#k

Anyway, I thought it was really something that a weapon has its own identity, but seriously... this weapon does not stop talking. It first kept on crying because I wasn't really paying attention to its needs, and... ahh, please keep this a secret from the pole arm. I don't think it's a good idea to upset the weapon any further.
